chapter.title: Logging In to Knowledge
chapter.para: When the administrator creates an account for you, you will receive an email, which will contain login information (be sure to check your spam folder). Once you receive your login information you can access Knowledge. However, if you do not receive an email with your account and login information, contact the Knowledge administrator.

section.title: User Roles
section.para:
A user is given at least one role and can also have more than one role in Knowledge. There are six roles in Knowledge they have the following permissions:
Read role: users with Read role can view content
Editor role: user's can modify content, create new content, search, classify, and export content
Content Manager: the Content Manager has all the capabilities of the Editor role, export content, and can create a version of the content
System Manager: the System Manager can has administrative privileges to manage users and their roles
Administrator role: administrators can create user accounts, modify user accounts, editing functionality and the ability to release content
Automated: This is a role used for system to system communication

section.title: Login
section.para:
To Login enter your username (is not case sensitive) and password (is case sensitive). If Remember my username is selected your username will be present when you login again. If you forget your username or password select the appropriate link on the Knowledge Login screen and an email will be sent to you with your username or a link to reset your password. Login

simplesect.title: Knowledge Homepage
simplesect.para: When you login into Knowledge you will see the Knowledge Manager Homepage as shown in .

From this page you can:
select the Profile menu option to change your profile
add a user or modify a user's role if you are an administrator
select the Go To Editor button to go to the Knowledge Editor
select the Go To API button to be view the Rest API documentation
select the Logout button to logout of the application

section.title: Edit Profile
section.para:
To modify your profile section the Profile menu option. A user can modify the following:
Display name
User name
Email address
Change password
To save changes select the Save button. The Cancelbutton will discard any changes made. User Profile
